directions: Provide a space for the chicken to live and roam
Feed the chicken a balanced diet of grains and insects
Ensure the chicken has constant access to fresh water
Wait for the chicken to mature and start laying eggs (around 4 to 6 months)
Collect the eggs by gently removing them from the chicken's nesting area
Rinse the eggs under water, if desired, to remove any dirt or debris
Store the eggs in a cool and dry place until ready to use
